sentences.en: A psychiatrist can help some people to understand their subconscious urges.
sentences.cn: 精神病专家能帮助人们了解潜意识下的冲动.

sentences.en: Because your subconscious mind would know the alcohol for what it is.
sentences.cn: 因为你的潜意识会知道甲醇到底是什么.

sentences.en: Early experiences can implant fears in the subconscious.
sentences.cn: 早年的经历会在下意识中埋入恐惧感.

sentences.en: He caught her arm in a subconscious attempt to detain her.
sentences.cn: 他下意识地抓住她的胳膊想挽留她。

sentences.en: Inner voice is the voice mouth of the subconscious mind.
sentences.cn: 心灵是诉说潜意识的嘴.

sentences.en: Is Ricky passing me in my subconscious?
sentences.cn: 瑞奇在我有意识的情况下想超越我?

sentences.en: My answer seemed to come from the subconscious.
sentences.cn: 我的回答似乎出自下意识.

sentences.en: My subconscious self is expressing irrational fears.
sentences.cn: 我的潜意识本质表现出失去理性的恐惧.

sentences.en: Nail biting is often a subconscious reaction to tension.
sentences.cn: 咬指甲通常是紧张时的下意识反映.

sentences.en: Our mind is divided in two parts; Conscious mind & subconscious mind.
sentences.cn: 我们的意识划分为两部分: 显意识 及 潜意识.

sentences.en: Subconscious it is same, so the dream also is same.
sentences.cn: 潜意识是一样的, 所以梦也是一样的.

sentences.en: Subconscious Perception - Submit, share and view great stories, dreams and experiences.
sentences.cn: 潜意识知觉提交, 分享和看法伟大的故事, 梦想和经验.

sentences.en: The memory of it all was locked deep in my subconscious.
sentences.cn: 关于它的一切记忆都深植于我的潜意识里。

sentences.en: The subconscious does not communicate in words, but rather in pictures.
sentences.cn: 潜意识并不会用语言交流, 而只是画面.

sentences.en: These defensive behavior patterns derive from our subconscious fears.
sentences.cn: 这些防范的行为模式源于我们潜意识里的恐惧.

trans.tran_en: subconscious feelings, desires etc are hidden in your mind and affect your behaviour, but you do not know that you have them
the part of your mind that has thoughts and feelings you do not know about
